markdown:
[
{"scene_number": 1, "timestamp": "00:00 - 00:15", "location": "Park at night", "visual_description": "A person is walking a dog in a park at night. The person is wearing a dark shirt and shorts. The dog is small and white. The park has trees and grass, with some lights in the background. The camera is positioned behind the person and dog, showing them from the back.", "characters": ["Person walking dog"], "dialogue": "אה, אה, אה, אה,", "mood_tone": "Casual, everyday activity"},
{"scene_number": 2, "timestamp": "00:15 - 00:30", "location": "Park at night", "visual_description": "A man is standing in a park at night, talking on his phone. He is wearing a red t-shirt and dark pants. He has a beard and short hair. He is looking down and appears to be in conversation. The background shows trees and some out-of-focus lights. The camera is focused on the man.", "characters": ["Man on phone"], "dialogue": "כן. היי, עצקו, מה קורה אחי? ככה הרבה זמן לחזורה. כן, סורי, אולי, עם דברים על הראש. מה, על מרצי תלדבר?", "mood_tone": "Conversational, slightly apologetic"},
{"scene_number": 3, "timestamp": "00:30 - 00:45", "location": "Park at night", "visual_description": "A man is sitting on a bench in a park at night, looking thoughtful. He is wearing a red t-shirt. He has short, dark hair and a beard. He is holding something in his hand. The background is blurred, with some lights visible. The camera is a medium close-up on the man's face.", "characters": ["Man on bench"], "dialogue": "מה, אתה עם הכלבה עכשיו? כן, אני מרדן, הטיול על לי, את יודעת. על מרצי תלדבר? עצקו?", "mood_tone": "Pensive, slightly frustrated"},
{"scene_number": 4, "timestamp": "00:45 - 01:00", "location": "Park at night", "visual_description": "A man is standing in a park at night, talking on his phone. He is wearing a red t-shirt. He has short, dark hair and a beard. He is gesturing with his free hand. The background is blurred, with trees and lights. The camera is a medium shot.", "characters": ["Man on phone"]
